front.title: Managed Objects for ATM over Packet Switched Network (PSN)

abstract.t: This memo defines an experimental portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it describes managed objects for modeling ATM Pseudowire (PW) carrying ATM cells over Packet Switch Network (PSN) as defined in the PWE3 [ATMENCAP]and [ATMTRANS].
